attributes.action: To Stop MP’s Interfering to stop a NO Deal Brexit
attributes.additional_details: The Result of the UK Referendum was a Democratic Vote to LEAVE. This must be honoured either by a NO DEAL or at worse a Bad Deal, Leaving the EU must happen and MP's must not attempt to boycott Brexit in any way, Leave means Leave.
attributes.background: If The Brexit Deal is rejected by Parliament as a Bad Deal then we must leave the EU with a No Deal in accordance with the original statement of "No Deal is better than a Bad Deal"

rejection.details:
You might like to sign and share this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963
